remarks: Value of the projective subspace closure function.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pclfval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pclfval.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
pclfval.c $e |- U = ( PCl ` K ) $.
pclvalN $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ X C_ A ) -> ( U ` X ) = |^| { y e. S | X C_ y } ) $.
$d A y $.
$d K y $.
$d S y $.
$d X y $.
